body:
Hi Victor,


If you are using linux or mac, this sort of thing is simple with awk. There
might be an equivalent with windows.


echo 1,2,3 4,5 | awk -F, '{if($2>$1)print $3;else print 0}'
output:
3 4


Andy
___
